original_text:
Cloud Corsairs
La Fantasma Games ha appena rilasciato Cloud Corsairs, una slot dall’ambientazione Steampunk in cui fulmini e dirigibili potrebbero farti vincere premi favolosi.
Lotta tra dirigibili
Dobbiamo dirlo, le slot a tema steampunk sono tra quelle che emozionano di più. Dirigibili veloci come aerei, città sospese tra le nuvole, macchine mosse dal vapore, ingranaggi capaci di muovere tonnellate di ferro, sono gli elementi fondanti di questa corrente letteraria che ha H.G. Wells come uno dei massimi esponenti.
In questa slot i protagonisti sono dei pirati dei cieli che proveranno in tutti i modi a depredare i voli commerciali in arrivo alla città sospesa tra le nuvole.
Anche in Cloud Corsairs la grafica è uno dei principali protagonisti del gioco, con dei disegni in stile cartoon e personaggi con una definizione davvero meticolosa.
Caratteristiche della slot
Lasciamo per un attimo l’aspetto grafico e le meccaniche di gioco per soffermarci sulle funzioni di cui dispone questo gioco. Innanzitutto, ci troviamo a giocare su una griglia 5×3, con 27 linee di pagamento e una puntata minima di 0,25 €.
Per vincere è necessario associare simboli identici a partire dal rullo di sinistra procedendo verso destra, o concludere la combo con il simbolo Jolly.
La volatilità di Cloud Corsairs è alta, mentre il dato RTP si attesta su un ottimo 96,34%.
I simboli regolari sono 8, 4 di basso livello e 4 di alto livello. I primi sono rappresentati dalle rose dei venti di diversi colori, i secondi dai pirati della storia. Accanto al quinto rullo si trova un rullo aggiuntivo in cui sono presenti dei moltiplicatori e che contribuiscono ad aumentare il valore delle vincite.
In Cloud Corsairs abbiamo ben tre funzioni speciali:

Zeppelin Respins: Questa funzione viene attivata quando nella combo vincente compare il simbolo del dirigibile, che rimarrà bloccato mentre i Respins attiveranno diversi moltiplicatori per un massimo di 50x.
Bonus: con tre simboli bonus, si ottengono 12 giri gratuiti. Qui le vincite pagano in entrambe le direzioni, da sinistra verso destra e viceversa. Ogni volta che compaiono ulteriori simboli bonus, un contatore speciale posto alla sinistra della griglia avanzerà di livello per raggiungere i tre obiettivi. Dopo 4 simboli bonus, verrà sbloccato uno slot in più dei moltiplicatori che si trovano sulla sinistra e si avrà diritto a ulteriori 4 giri extra; con 9 simboli gli slot sbloccati saranno due e si otterranno altri 4 giri gratuiti; con 15 bonus si attiva il Super Free Spins. In questo caso la griglia si svuota e compariranno solo dirigibili
Lightning Mystery: in questo caso i fulmini inceneriscono sei simboli a caso e li sostituisce per formare delle combo vincenti.

raw_translation.response:
Cloud Corsairs
La Fantasma Games has just released Cloud Corsairs, a Steampunk-themed slot where lightning and airships could earn you fabulous prizes.
Airship Battle
We have to say, steampunk-themed slots are among the most exciting. Fast airships like planes, cities suspended in the clouds, steam-driven machines, gears capable of moving tons of iron - these are the fundamental elements of this literary movement, of which H.G. Wells is one of the greatest exponents.
In this slot, the protagonists are sky pirates who will try in every way to plunder the commercial flights arriving at the city suspended in the clouds.
In Cloud Corsairs, graphics are one of the main protagonists of the game, with cartoon-style drawings and characters with very meticulous definition.
Slot Features
Let's leave the graphic aspect and game mechanics aside for a moment to focus on the functions available in this game. First of all, we find ourselves playing on a 5×3 grid, with 27 paylines and a minimum bet of €0.25.
To win, you need to match identical symbols starting from the left reel and moving right, or complete the combo with the Wild symbol.
The volatility of Cloud Corsairs is high, while the RTP figure stands at an excellent 96.34%.
There are 8 regular symbols, 4 low-level and 4 high-level. The former are represented by wind roses of different colors, the latter by the pirates of the story. Next to the fifth reel, there is an additional reel on which there are multipliers that help increase the value of wins.
In Cloud Corsairs, we have three special functions:

Zeppelin Respins: This function is activated when the winning combo includes the airship symbol, which will remain locked while resins trigger various multipliers for up to 50x.
Bonus: With three bonus symbols, you get 12 free spins. Here, wins pay in both directions, from left to right and vice versa. Every time additional bonus symbols appear, a special counter on the left of the grid will move up to reach the three objectives. After 4 bonus symbols, one more slot of the multipliers on the left will be unlocked, and you'll be entitled to an additional 4 extra spins; with 9 symbols, two unlocked slots will be available, and you'll get another 4 free spins; with 15 bonuses, the Super Free Spins are activated. In this case, the grid is emptied, and only airships appear.
Lightning Mystery: in this case, lightning incinerates six random symbols and replaces them to form winning combos.

Experienced gamblers know that a slot game should be more than just pretty graphics and thematic sounds, and Cloud Corsairs delivers on all fronts. With multiple bonus features that can lead to big wins, this game appeals to players who demand more complexity in their gameplay. Give it a spin and see if you have what it takes to become a sky pirate legend.

response.headline: Symbols and Paylines
response.content:
If you're a fan of pirate stories and adventurous slot games, then Cloud Corsairs is the perfect game for you! With 27 paylines and 8 fun symbols, this game offers exciting chances to win big. Let's dive into the symbols and paylines and see what this game has in store for us.

The symbols in Cloud Corsairs are divided into two levels. The low-level symbols are represented by wind roses of different colors. If you're not familiar with wind roses, don't worry, they won't give you motion sickness. They're just fancy looking compasses that sailors and pirates used to navigate the high seas. The high-level symbols, on the other hand, are the buccaneers of the story. They're a motley crew of pirates with eye patches, beards, hats, and swords. It's like a casting call for Pirates of the Caribbean, but with less makeup and more treasure hunting.

The airship symbol is the Wild. It's not just any airship though, it's a super-powered, steam punk-inspired blimp that can substitute for any other symbol to create a winning combination. That's like having a genie in a bottle, but instead of granting wishes, it grants you gold coins and cash prizes. To make a winning combo, players must match symbols on any of the 27 paylines. These paylines start from the left reel and move towards the right. Think of it like a treasure map and you're trying to connect the dots, except instead of an X, you're looking for the airship symbol.

Overall, Cloud Corsairs is a fun game that combines pirate adventure with classic slot machine gameplay. With its colorful symbols and generous number of paylines, it's a game that is sure to keep you entertained for hours. So hoist the mainsail, and get ready to find your fortune in the skies!
